segments.text: Berberine can lower fasting glucose and HbA1c in type 2 diabetes in some studies. It also has GI side effects for some people.

expected_claims.claim: Berberine supplementation can reduce glycemic markers (e.g., HbA1c) in type 2 diabetes.

references.title: PubMed query: berberine HbA1c type 2 diabetes meta-analysis
